content.text:
# List of awards and nominations received by Tracey Takes On...

Tracey Takes On... is an HBO comedy series, running for four seasons from 1996 to 1999. It received multiple awards and nominations. The series won a total of 7 Primetime Emmy Awards. The awards and nominations are listed below.
Awards and nominations

Primetime Emmy Awards
